name: How It Ended
description:
United Climate Task Force We must delay the inevitable.

The UN has finally signed off on the creation of the United Climate Task Force (UCTF) and appointed you as its leader. Though the road ahead is sure to be rife with challenges and setbacks, the world has put its faith in you to prepare humanity against the existential threat of climate change.

From here on out, it will be up to you to oversee the direction of the UCTF.

The world is depending on you.

We recommend playing in full screen!

Patch Notes

v1.0.1 (6 April 2022)

  • Fixed issues with decommission button not properly refunding 50% of building cost
  • Fixed minor text formatting with End Turn button
  • Fixed issue where tooltips would not work when loading from title screen
  • Fixed issue where the same event could appear several times in a row 
  • Resurrected the Baltic Sea
  • Added "Return to Main Menu" prompt when hitting Esc key
